Package com.binance.connector.futures.client.impl

Class CMWebsocketClientImpl

java.lang.Object
com.binance.connector.futures.client.impl.WebsocketClientImpl
com.binance.connector.futures.client.impl.CMWebsocketClientImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebsocketClient
public class CMWebsocketClientImpl extends WebsocketClientImpl

COIN-M Websocket Streams

All stream endpoints under the Websocket Market Streams and User Data Streams section of the API documentation will be implemented in this class.
Response will be returned as callback.

  • Method Details

    • indexPriceStream

      public int indexPriceStream(String pair, int speed, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback)
      Index Price Stream

      <pair>@indexPrice or <pair>@indexPrice@1s

      Update Speed: 3000ms or 1000ms
      Parameters:
      pair - trading pair
      speed - speed in seconds, can be 1 or 3
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID
      See Also:
      • https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/delivery/en/#index-price-streams

    • indexPriceStreamRequestString

      Parameters:
      initalString -
      speed -
      pair -
      Returns:

    • indexPriceStream

      public int indexPriceStream(String pair, int speed, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onOpenCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onClosingCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onFailureCallback)
      Same as indexPriceStream(String, int, WebSocketCallback) plus accepts callbacks for all major websocket connection events.
      Parameters:
      pair - trading pair
      speed - speed in seconds, can be 1 or 3
      onOpenCallback - onOpenCallback
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      onClosingCallback - onClosingCallback
      onFailureCallback - onFailureCallback

      int - Connection ID

    • markPriceSymbolsPairStream

      public int markPriceSymbolsPairStream(String pair, int speed, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback)
      Mark price and funding rate for a single pair pushed every 3 seconds or every second.

      <pair>@markPrice or <pair>@markPrice@1s

      Update Speed: 3000ms or 1000ms
      Parameters:
      pair - trading pair
      speed - speed in seconds, can be 1 or 3
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID
      See Also:
      • https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/delivery/en/#mark-price-of-all-symbols-of-a-pair

    • markPriceSymbolsPairStream

      public int markPriceSymbolsPairStream(MarkPriceSymbolParams markPriceSymbolParams)
      Same as markPriceSymbolsPairStream(String, int, WebSocketCallback) plus accepts callbacks for all major websocket connection events.
      Parameters:
      markPriceSymbolParams -
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID

    • indexKlineCandlestick

      public int indexKlineCandlestick(String pair, String interval, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback)
      The Kline/Candlestick Stream push updates to the current klines/candlestick every 250 milliseconds (if existing).

      <pair>@indexPriceKline_<interval>

      Update Speed: 250ms
      Parameters:
      pair - trading pair
      interval - kline interval - 1m 3m 5m 15m 30m 1h 2h 4h 6h 8h 12h 1d 3d 1w 1M
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID
      See Also:
      • https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/delivery/en/#index-kline-candlestick-streams

    • indexKlineCandlestick

      public int indexKlineCandlestick(String pair, String interval, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onOpenCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onClosingCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onFailureCallback)
      Same as indexKlineCandlestick(String, String, WebSocketCallback) plus accepts callbacks for all major websocket connection events.
      Parameters:
      pair - trading pair
      interval - kline interval - 1m 3m 5m 15m 30m 1h 2h 4h 6h 8h 12h 1d 3d 1w 1M
      onOpenCallback - onOpenCallback
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      onClosingCallback - onClosingCallback
      onFailureCallback - onFailureCallback
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID
